duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver safe patient care using the nursing process of assessment, planning, implementation, and evaluation.
Provide direct patient care and maintain standards of care in Telemetry Unit.
Direct and guide patient/family teaching and activities of other nursing personnel.
Communicate with physician about changes in patient's clinical condition, including cardiac monitoring.
Respond quickly and accurately to changes in patient's condition and/or response to treatment.

education_certification.credential: Current and valid state RN License.
Current BLS (AHA) certificate upon hire and maintain current.
Current ACLS (AHA) certificate 30 days upon hire and maintain current.
Previous Acute Care hospital experience preferred.
Medical-Surgical Nurse-Board Certified (RN-BC) or similar certification; preferred.
Bachelor of Science in Nursing (BSN) preferred.
